title: Spice of Life
description: Serves meat, veg options available. While the menu may seem heavy on meat dishes, the staff is very accommodating to vegetarians and vegans and will alter dishes to suit. Vegans can get the Thai wrap when substituting tofu for chicken, linguini with Italian red sauce by omitting cheese, nori maki vegetable sushi (when available), sesame noodle salad, edamame, Thai curry noodles with vegetables and tofu. There are several other lacto-veg items on the menu. Fast service.
